docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text:
For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

Home page of Material for MkDocs

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: References
docs.text:
• Material for MkDocs: Full Tutorial To Build And Deploy Your Docs Portal - YouTube
  • Using Emmet and Lorem Ipsum in Markdown files with Visual Studio Code | Tutorial | Front End Dev - YouTube

docs.title: Admonitions
docs.text:
Example of an admonition/callout with a title:

Title of the callout

Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Iure officia molestias veritatis nulla quam, sequi itaque, illo minus voluptatum distinctio dolore quis molestiae, suscipit porro. Temporibus laboriosam ad voluptate omnis.

Collapsible callout

Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Iure officia molestias veritatis nulla quam, sequi itaque, illo minus voluptatum distinctio dolore quis molestiae, suscipit porro. Temporibus laboriosam ad voluptate omnis.

docs.title: Code examples
docs.text:
An example of a codeblock for Python:

add_numbers.py
# Function to add two number
def add_two_numbers(num1, num2):
    return num1 + num2

# Example usage
result = add_two_numbers(5, 3)
print(f'The sum is: {result}')

Example codeblock for JavaScript with lines highlighted:

concatenate_strings.js
// Function to concatenate two strings
function concatenateStrings(str1, str2) {
  return str1 + str2;
}

// Example usage
const result = concatenateStrings("Hello", " World!");
console.log("The result is: ", result);

docs.title: Code blocks in content tabs
Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
    A[start] --> B{Failure?};
    B -->|Yes| C[Investigate...];
    C --> D[Debug];
    D --> B;
    B ---->|No| E[Success!];

docs.title: Sequence Diagrams
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    Server->>Terminal: Send request
    loop Health
        Terminal->>Terminal: Check for health
    end
    Note right of Terminal: system online
    Terminal-->>Server: Everything is OK
    Terminal-->>Datbase: Request customer data
    Database-->>Termial: Customer data
